shortlist.name: Royal Playwright
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite at 5/6 (1.93 exchange), clear market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer at this level with solid recent form figures, regularly placing and running respectably in competitive company. Top jockey and trainer combination adds further confidence. Odds reflect strong market support and suggest minimal improvement needed to win here.

shortlist.name: Mister Rizz
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market at 6/5 (2.54 exchange), clear of outsiders.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win and two other strong runs from four starts. Recent form is competitive for this grade. Trainer and jockey are both in good form. Market position indicates genuine winning chance without needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Bay Of Brilliance
shortlist.odds_note: 1/1 SBK, 2.32 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Represents a top yard in Ralph Beckett and is the clear market leader. The recent fifth-place finish may not tell the full story, as margins in flat racing can be small and improvement is likely on second start. Connections are in excellent form and the odds reflect strong confidence.

shortlist.name: A Taste Of Glory (Ger)
shortlist.odds_note: 10/3 SBK, 4.9 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Finished fourth on debut, which can be a solid platform for improvement, especially for a well-bred type from the Balding yard. Oisin Murphy is a notable booking, and the odds indicate genuine market respect. Likely to progress and should be competitive.

shortlist.name: Alpha Crucis (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Solid market support (3/1 SBK, 5.0 exchange) indicates strong chance.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two wins and a close second in last four starts. Connections are reliable and the horse is proven at this level. Odds reflect genuine market confidence and value for a likely winner.

shortlist.name: Rhoscolyn
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market (16/5 SBK, 5.8 exchange) with top jockey booked.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts back and now partnered by a leading jockey. Trainer excels with this type and the horse has competitive form at this grade. Odds are fair for a horse with proven ability and connections.

shortlist.name: Cerulean Bay (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Third in market (9/2 SBK, 6.8 exchange) and trending upward.
shortlist.rationale: Placed in last two starts, showing improvement and consistency. Trainer/jockey combination is strong and the horse is well-handicapped for this contest. Odds offer reasonable value for a runner on the upgrade.

shortlist.name: Saddadd (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite at 11/8 (SBK), 2.8 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with three wins from last four starts, including back-to-back victories. Trained by Roger Varian, who is in excellent form, and partnered by a reliable jockey. The odds reflect strong market confidence and the horseâ€™s recent form is the best in the field.

shortlist.name: Ancient Wisdom (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice at 11/4 (SBK), 3.95 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Group-class performer with proven ability at a higher level. Recent form is solid if not spectacular, but represents top connections (Appleby/Buick) and is priced as the main danger to the favourite. Capable of improvement and has the class edge over most rivals.

shortlist.name: Timeforshowcasing
shortlist.odds_note: Strong market position (16/5 SBK, 4.8 exchange), clear favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes two wins from last four starts, indicating peak condition. Connections are high-class: Doyle is a top jockey and Johnston is a proven trainer. Odds reflect strong market confidence and suggest genuine winning chance.

shortlist.name: Wetsand (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market (15/4 SBK, 6 exchange).
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two wins in last three runs, including latest. Form suggests improvement and ability to handle competitive fields. Odds are solid for a likely contender.

shortlist.name: Alarming
shortlist.odds_note: Third in market (9/2 SBK, 6.6 exchange).
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced and finished runner-up on debut, showing promise. Beckett is a respected trainer and Ryan is a reliable jockey. Market support indicates expectations for further progress.

shortlist.name: Finalise
shortlist.odds_note: 7/4 SBK, 3.2 exchange (clear favourite)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive recent form with two seconds and a win, representing a top trainer and jockey combination. The odds reflect strong market support and suggest the horse is expected to run very well at this level.

shortlist.name: Simply Ruby
shortlist.odds_note: 10/3 SBK, 5.3 exchange (second favourite)
shortlist.rationale: Solid recent win and placed effort, with a top jockey booked. Consistent performer who has shown ability in similar company, and the odds indicate genuine market respect.

shortlist.name: Likealot
shortlist.odds_note: 11/2 SBK, 7.4 exchange (third in market, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two runner-up finishes and a win in last five starts. Trainer and jockey are in good form, and the odds offer reasonable value for a horse likely to be competitive.

shortlist.name: Rory Rocket
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 5.9 exchange (solid market support, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, suggesting reliability and readiness to win. Connections are respected, and odds indicate strong market confidence. No signs of regression in form, and profile fits a horse likely to be competitive at this level.

shortlist.name: Tiger Tulip
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 6.8 exchange (well-supported, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Recent wins and solid efforts in higher grade races, with a top jockey booked. Form shows ability to win and compete at this level. Odds reflect genuine market respect and suggest a strong chance if running to recent best.

shortlist.name: Silver Wraith
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 6.6 exchange (firmly in the market, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with several recent placings, indicating reliability. Top jockey booking is a positive. While not winning recently, always close up and likely to be in the mix again. Odds are fair for a horse with this profile.

shortlist.name: Mount Olympus
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 SBK, 5.7 exchange (solid market support, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer at this level with a strong win record earlier in career and recent runs in competitive company. Alan King is a respected trainer and Sean Levey is a reliable jockey. Recent form figures show competitiveness without being outclassed, and current odds reflect genuine market respect.

shortlist.name: Golden Dove
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 6.6 exchange (well found in the market, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placer with recent form figures showing two solid runs this season. Jack Mitchell is a capable jockey and the horse has been knocking on the door at this level. Odds indicate strong market confidence and the profile suggests a win is within reach.

shortlist.name: Moab (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 6 exchange (market respect, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form shows improvement with a good third last time out. Has been running consistently in similar company and is not exposed as needing major improvement. Odds are competitive and connections are capable at this level.

shortlist.name: I Can Dance
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite; 11/10 (SBK), 2.22 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent runner with two recent runner-up finishes, indicating reliability and readiness to win. Top connections with Charlie Johnston and Jack Mitchell. Current odds reflect strong market confidence and suggest the horse is expected to be highly competitive.

shortlist.name: Brigid's Well (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice; 7/2 (SBK), 5.4 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Impressive last-time-out winner (form '1') and previously unplaced, suggesting marked improvement. Trained by Hugo Palmer and ridden by Cieren Fallon, both respected at this level. Odds indicate solid market support and realistic winning chance if progress continues.

shortlist.name: Hilltop
shortlist.odds_note: 2/1 SBK, 3.1 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Comes here off a win last time out, showing ability to peak at the right time. Consistent profile this season, and connections are in good form. David Egan is a reliable jockey booking. No signs of regression in recent runs, and odds reflect strong chance.

shortlist.name: Midsummer Music (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/2 SBK, 7.8 exchange (solid second tier in market)
shortlist.rationale: Latest run was a win, indicating upward trajectory. Has shown ability to handle similar company and conditions. Trainer and jockey both capable at this level. Odds offer value for a last-time-out winner with proven form.

shortlist.name: Angel Love
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite; 5/6 (SBK), 1.82 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Showed immediate promise with a runner-up debut, indicating ability and likely improvement. Top connections, positive market support, and the best recent form in the field. No major negatives and profile fits a typical maiden winner at this track.

shortlist.name: Trio
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market; 4/1 (SBK), 6.8 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Debut run was fair in a decent maiden; expected to improve for experience. Trainer has a good record with juveniles at Kempton. Represents value as the clear second pick on both form and market position.

shortlist.name: Fiery Damsel (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Third in market; 5/1 (SBK), 7.6 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Respectable debut effort in a competitive race, with scope to progress. Yard is in form and often improves runners for their second start. Market support suggests connections expect a forward showing.

shortlist.name: Wine Dark Sea
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 4.3 exchange (clear favourite, solid market support)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a recent win and a strong follow-up run; lightly raced and open to further improvement. Top connections and market leader status reinforce confidence.

shortlist.name: Masterinthewoods (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 SBK, 5.6 exchange (well-supported, second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple recent placings and a win two starts back. Reliable form in similar company and holding condition well. Market respect and solid each-way claims.

shortlist.name: Kingkeer
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 7 exchange (third in market, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Returned to form with a win two starts ago and a good second last time. Consistent at this level and connections capable. Profile suggests further competitiveness.

shortlist.name: Dixieland Blues
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 4.2 Exchange (market leader)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with a recent win and solid placed efforts; connections are in strong form and the odds reflect market confidence. No major negatives in recent runs and should be suited by conditions.

shortlist.name: Storm Free
shortlist.odds_note: 7/2 SBK, 5.1 Exchange (second choice)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win two starts back and placed efforts; lightly raced this season and open to further improvement. Trainer is adept with this type and odds are competitive for a likely contender.

shortlist.name: Chalk Mountain
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 SBK, 5.4 exchange (solid market support, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer at this level with multiple recent placings; reliable jockey booking; odds indicate strong market respect. No sign of major decline in form and should be competitive again.

shortlist.name: Arctic Dawn
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 5.7 exchange (well-fancied, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Latest win shows current well-being; versatile profile with a top jockey; connections in good form. Recent win suggests improvement and readiness for this level.

shortlist.name: One More (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 6.2 exchange (firmly in the market, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with three consecutive seconds before a breakthrough win last time; top trainer and jockey combination; lightly raced and open to further improvement.

shortlist.name: The Quiet Gent (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 6.6 exchange (market support, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent at this level with multiple placings; strong connections; recent form figures suggest reliability and ability to compete for the win.

shortlist.name: Spirit Lead Me (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 SBK, 5.6 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistently supported in the market and holds the best available odds among the field. Recent form is patchy but includes a third and several midfield finishes in higher grade, suggesting competitiveness at this level. Richard Hughes is a respected trainer and the booking of Finley Marsh is positive. No major improvement needed to feature.

shortlist.name: Rockstar Icon (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 6 exchange (solid second-favorite, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with recent form figures showing ability to place in similar company. Connections are capable and the horse has been running respectably in competitive handicaps. Market support is steady, indicating confidence from connections and punters.

shortlist.name: Dollyana
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 8 exchange (third in market, within value range)
shortlist.rationale: Has been running consistently well, with several recent placings suggesting reliability and fitness. The stable is in form and the jockey is experienced. No evidence of needing major improvement to win at this level.

shortlist.name: Muma Myflo
shortlist.odds_note: 7/2 SBK, 5.6 exchange (solid market support, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three placings from last four starts, suggesting reliability and fitness. Connections are respected at this level and the odds indicate strong market confidence. No need for major improvement to feature.

shortlist.name: Initial Blue (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 10/3 SBK, 5.1 exchange (well found in the market, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes a close fourth last time, and the horse has previously won at this level. Trainer and jockey are both proven in similar races. Odds reflect strong support and realistic winning chance.

shortlist.name: Starproof (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 4.9 exchange (firmly among the market leaders)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts back and a respectable effort last time suggest the horse is in good form. Connections are capable, and the odds indicate the market expects another bold showing.

shortlist.name: Wandering Ego (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite; 5/4 (SBK), 2.36 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with consistent recent form, including a win and two placings last season. Returns for a top yard with a leading jockey. Current odds reflect strong market confidence and suggest a high probability of success. No signs of needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Eternal Echo (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice; 5/2 (SBK), 3.85 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with a win and two placings in last four starts. Trained by Gordon Elliott, who excels with runners at this level. Market support is solid and form is reliable, making this runner a key threat to the favourite.

shortlist.name: Spectacularsunrise
shortlist.odds_note: Third in market; 5/2 (SBK), 4.3 (exchange)
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced with a win and a fourth in last season's form. Represents a respected yard and has a top jockey booked. Odds indicate market respect, and form suggests potential to improve further without needing a major leap.

shortlist.name: Moonbow (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: 10/3 SBK, 5.2 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three wins from last five starts, including a win last time out. Top jockey booking in Brian Hughes adds confidence. Odds reflect strong market support and suggest stable expectations. No sign of decline in form and connections are reliable at this level.

shortlist.name: Holeshot (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 7.4 exchange (well-supported, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes two wins from last four starts before a break, indicating ability at this level. Sean Bowen is a positive jockey booking. Market position is solid and form is progressive, with no major negatives in profile.

shortlist.name: I Wish You (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: 6/1 SBK, 7 exchange (respected in market, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple placings and a win this season. Recent form is competitive for this grade. Connections are in good form and the horse is holding its level. Odds indicate market respect.

shortlist.name: Karton Plein (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite; 11/5 SBK, 3.25 exchange
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a win two starts back and a solid trainer-jockey combination. Recent form is reliable and connections are in good order. Odds reflect strong market support, indicating confidence.

shortlist.name: Pure Gold
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market; 4/1 SBK, 6.4 exchange
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form, including a win and a runner-up finish in last two starts. Profile suggests reliability and fitness. Odds offer fair value for a horse with proven recent performance.

shortlist.name: Statuario
shortlist.odds_note: 2/1 SBK, 3.05 exchange (clear favourite, solid market support)
shortlist.rationale: Returned from a break with a win two starts ago and remains lightly raced this season. Recent form is solid, and the Bowen team is in good order. Sean Bowen is a top jockey at this venue. No major negatives in profile or market.

shortlist.name: Whistle Stop Tour (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/4 SBK, 3.5 exchange (well-supported, clear second choice)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent profile last season with multiple wins and placed efforts. Returns after a break but has gone well fresh before. Lucinda Russell is a leading local trainer and Derek Fox is a reliable jockey for the yard. Market respect is notable.

shortlist.name: Pescatorius (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 13/8 SBK, 2.76 Exchange (clear favourite)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two solid placed efforts in last three starts. Trained by Olly Murphy, who has a strong record at Perth, and partnered by top jockey Sean Bowen. Current odds indicate strong market confidence and value for a horse proven at this level.

shortlist.name: Reflection Of You
shortlist.odds_note: 16/5 SBK, 4.6 Exchange (second favourite)
shortlist.rationale: Returned from break with a promising third last time, suggesting fitness and readiness. Connections are highly respected, and the horse has shown ability in similar company. Odds are competitive and reflect genuine winning chance.

shortlist.name: Stiletto
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 4.5 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Stiletto arrives in peak form, having won two of his last four starts and most recently scoring decisively. The booking of top jockey Sean Bowen is a positive, and the odds reflect strong market confidence. No signs of regression in recent runs, and connections are in good form.

shortlist.name: Burgundy Man (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/2 SBK, 6.4 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Burgundy Man is ultra-consistent, placing in each of his last five starts. While he has not won recently, his repeated close finishes suggest he is knocking on the door. The form is reliable, and he is unlikely to need major improvement to contend.

shortlist.name: Anamanda (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 7 exchange (well-supported, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Anamanda has a string of placed efforts and is rarely out of the frame. The consistent profile and competitive odds indicate market respect. While not prolific, she is reliable and does not require significant improvement to be involved.

shortlist.name: Rejjien (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/4 SBK, 3.65 Exchange (clear market leader)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive runner-up finishes, indicating reliability and readiness to win. Connections are solid, and current odds reflect strong market support. No signs of decline in form and should be suited by race conditions.

shortlist.name: Harswell River (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 6 Exchange (second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form includes several placed efforts, showing competitiveness at this level. Trainer has a good record at Redcar, and odds suggest genuine market respect. Not as consistent as the favorite but has shown enough ability to be a strong contender.

shortlist.name: Mossvale Diva (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/4 SBK, 3.35 exchange (clear favourite, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with back-to-back wins and a string of consistent placed efforts prior. Connections are reliable, and current odds reflect strong market support. No signs of decline and recent performances suggest she is still improving.

shortlist.name: Territorial Star
shortlist.odds_note: 13/2 SBK, 8 exchange (solid value, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent with three consecutive runner-up finishes, indicating readiness to break through. Form suggests reliability and competitiveness at this level. Odds offer each-way value and connections have placed the horse well.

shortlist.name: High Storm
shortlist.odds_note: Favoured at 5/4 (SBK) and 2.72 (exchange), clear market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Strong market support as favourite, representing a top yard in good form. Connections are reliable at this level and the lack of recent form suggests debut or unexposed potential, which is often respected in maiden/novice company. No signs of needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Yazin
shortlist.odds_note: Solid at 5/2 (SBK) and 3.9 (exchange), third choice in market.
shortlist.rationale: Good debut third for powerful connections, indicating ability and scope for improvement. Trainer/jockey combination is high class and the horse is not a longshot. Form suggests ready to progress without needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Hostility (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite; 1/1 SBK, 2.14 exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent form at this level, regularly placing and competitive in recent starts. Top connections with Tudhope/O'Meara, both proven at Redcar. Odds reflect strong market support and reliability, with no signs of declining form.

shortlist.name: Melvin Udall (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice; 9/4 SBK, 3.65 exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with two solid runs, showing improvement and likely to be suited by conditions. Mulrennan/Walker combination is respected, and odds indicate genuine market confidence. No major negatives in recent form.

shortlist.name: Harswell Ruby (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 5.3 exchange (solid market support, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, including two seconds in last four starts. Reliable jockey and trainer combination. No signs of decline and holding form well for this grade.

shortlist.name: War Supremo (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 5.9 exchange (competitive odds, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Strong recent form with a win three starts back and consistent placings. Connections are in good order and the horse has shown ability at this level. No major improvement needed, just needs to reproduce best recent effort.

shortlist.name: Titian (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 5.9 exchange (well-backed, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win four starts ago and competitive efforts since. Trainer is respected and the horse has shown ability to handle similar company. Form is steady and connections are reliable.

shortlist.name: Money Pockets
shortlist.odds_note: 9/4 SBK, 3.4 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Arrives in peak form with a recent win and multiple placings, indicating consistency and improvement. The current odds reflect strong market confidence, and the booking of a reliable jockey further boosts prospects. No signs of regression in recent runs.

shortlist.name: Monks Dream (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 4 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Consistently competitive at this level, with several respectable finishes. The odds suggest market respect and the trainer/jockey combination is proven at this track. While not as progressive as the favourite, recent form is solid and no major improvement is required to contend.

shortlist.name: Lumenbourg
shortlist.odds_note: 11/4 SBK, 4.6 exchange (clear favourite, solid market support)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win in last six starts. Remains in good heart, holding form well without signs of regression. Top connections for this grade and is well found in the market, indicating strong confidence.

shortlist.name: Ey Up Its Jazz
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 6.2 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is progressive with two wins in last four starts, including a latest victory. Profile suggests further improvement is possible and market position confirms respect. Connections are in form and the horse is proven at this level.

shortlist.name: Pearly Squirrel (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 16/5 SBK, 4.6 exchange (clear market leader, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win in last six starts. Market support is strong, indicating confidence. Connections are solid and the horse is proven at this level.

shortlist.name: Good Karma
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 7.2 exchange (well-supported, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win two starts back and competitive efforts since. Odds suggest genuine market respect. Form is improving and the horse is holding condition.

shortlist.name: I'll Sort That (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 7/5 SBK, 2.96 exchange (clear market leader)
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with three wins and a second from last four starts, suggesting strong current form. Market support is significant, indicating confidence. Connections are reliable and the horse has proven ability at this level.

shortlist.name: Night Moon (Ger)
shortlist.odds_note: 11/5 SBK, 3.6 exchange (solid second-favorite)
shortlist.rationale: Represents top connections (Mullins/Townend) and is well found in the market despite limited form. Likely to improve from debut and respected on stable/jockey combination alone.

shortlist.name: Astelia (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 SBK, 6.2 exchange (third in market, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent with four consecutive runner-up finishes, indicating reliability and readiness. May lack a finishing kick but is always in contention and could capitalize if favorites underperform.

shortlist.name: Davy Crockett (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 4/9 (SBK), 1.58 (exchange) â€“ clear favourite
shortlist.rationale: Unbeaten in two starts, showing progressive and reliable form. Trained by Willie Mullins and ridden by Paul Townend, the leading combination in Irish jumps racing. Odds are short but justified by dominant profile and connections. No signs of decline or need for improvement.

shortlist.name: La Note Verte
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 (SBK), 6.2 (exchange) â€“ solid second choice
shortlist.rationale: Recent form figures include two wins this season before a respectable 6th in a likely stronger contest. Also trained by Mullins, indicating stable confidence. Odds offer some value as the clear second string with proven winning ability and fitness.

shortlist.name: Bearami Creek (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/8 SBK, 3.0 exchange (clear favourite, strong market support)
shortlist.rationale: Returned to form with a win last time out, indicating peak condition. Has a reliable jockey and trainer combination. Recent form figures show improvement and ability to win in this grade. Odds reflect strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: Eastmore
shortlist.odds_note: 4/1 SBK, 3.45 exchange (solid second choice in market)
shortlist.rationale: Latest run was a win, suggesting the horse is on the upgrade. Trained by Charles Byrnes, a respected handler. Form shows progression and ability to handle similar company. Odds indicate genuine support.

shortlist.name: Dunany Point (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 6/1 SBK, 3.25 exchange (well-backed, not an outsider)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with several placings and a win earlier this season. Remains competitive at this level and odds suggest market respect. Connections are capable and the horse is holding form.

shortlist.name: Tackletommywoowoo (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Strong market support (5/2 SBK, 4.6 exchange), clear favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win last time out signals peak form and readiness. Reliable jockey and trainer combination. Form shows improvement and resilience after a fall, with a win on latest start indicating confidence and fitness. No major negatives in profile.

shortlist.name: Bitofajokelike (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Solid value (4/1 SBK, 5 exchange), second choice in market.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with three consecutive placed efforts, including a win and two thirds. Connections are reliable at this level. Profile suggests ongoing improvement and ability to compete strongly in this field.

shortlist.name: You Oughta Know (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 7/2 SBK, 6.4 Exchange (market leader, solid support)
shortlist.rationale: Recent form is highly consistent with two seconds and a win in last three starts, indicating peak condition. Trained by W. P. Mullins and ridden by P. Townend, both top-class connections for Listowel. Odds reflect strong market confidence and value for a proven performer.

shortlist.name: Three Card Brag (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 5/1 SBK, 8.2 Exchange (solid second choice)
shortlist.rationale: Form includes a win and several placed efforts at a good level, with a recent run suggesting fitness. Gordon Elliott and J. W. Kennedy are a proven combination in competitive handicaps. Odds offer reasonable value for a horse with class and consistency.

shortlist.name: Thecompanysergeant
shortlist.odds_note: 6/1 SBK, 8.6 Exchange (well-backed, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Consistent placed form last season, including several seconds and thirds, and recent runs suggest readiness. Trainer Cromwell is adept at preparing horses for these events. Odds are competitive for a runner with reliable form and proven stamina.

shortlist.name: Zenta (Fr)
shortlist.odds_note: 7/4 SBK, 2.94 exchange (clear favourite)
shortlist.rationale: Top connections with Mullins/Townend, proven at graded level, and despite a mixed recent form, has placed in competitive races. Current odds reflect strong market support and class edge.

shortlist.name: Enjoy The Dream
shortlist.odds_note: 9/2 SBK, 4.1 exchange (solid second favourite)
shortlist.rationale: Recent win signals peak fitness and improvement. Consistent placings prior to latest victory, and odds offer value for a runner in form with proven stamina.

shortlist.name: Cloonainra (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: 15/4 SBK, 5.1 exchange (well-supported, not a longshot)
shortlist.rationale: Reliable recent form with multiple placings and a win two starts back. Connections are in good order and odds indicate market respect for consistency.

shortlist.name: Poetic Glory
shortlist.odds_note: Strong favourite on exchange (2.28), 4/1 SBK.
shortlist.rationale: Represents the Emmet Mullins yard, which is highly respected for targeting these races. Despite a poor last run (form '0'), the market support is significant, suggesting confidence from connections. Likely to improve and is well found in the betting.

shortlist.name: Apache Tribe (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Second favourite on exchange (3.5), 85/40 SBK.
shortlist.rationale: Comes from a stable with a good record in similar contests. Recent form is fair (5th), and the horse is prominent in the market, indicating expected improvement or suitability for this race type.

shortlist.name: Ring Of Kerry (Ire)
shortlist.odds_note: Third favourite on exchange (4.2), 11/4 SBK.
shortlist.rationale: Booked with leading amateur jockey Patrick Mullins, which is a notable positive in this sphere. Last run was disappointing (9th), but the market keeps him very competitive, and the jockey booking suggests connections expect a much better showing.

shortlist.name: Quarter Master (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Very short at 1.24, clear market leader.
shortlist.rationale: Dominant favourite on the exchange, suggesting strong confidence from the market and likely superior ability or connections. While lacking published recent form, the odds imply a significant class edge or inside stable confidence. No evidence of needing major improvement.

shortlist.name: Pinetti (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Solid second favourite at 2.02.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings, indicating reliability and fitness. Odds reflect strong market support as the main alternative to the favourite. Connections are competent and the horse does not require major improvement to contend.

shortlist.name: Sovereign Command (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange odds 1.95, clear second favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with two consecutive runner-up finishes indicates readiness and reliability. Connections are solid, and current odds offer reasonable value for a horse knocking on the door for a win[2][3].

shortlist.name: Quincy Town (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange odds 1.24, joint favourite.
shortlist.rationale: Despite patchy form, represents a top yard and is strongly supported in the market. Likely to be well-prepared and competitive at this level, with connections suggesting improvement is expected[3].

shortlist.name: Capricious Miss (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear market leader at 2.26 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form, notably a strong 2nd last time, and now faces a modest field. Top jockey/trainer combo and fitness is assured with regular racing. Odds reflect strong market confidence.

shortlist.name: Love The Usa (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Second choice in market at 2.8 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with each run showing improvement, and now gets a top jockey. Trainer is in good form. Market support is notable and suggests further improvement is expected.

shortlist.name: Ada Lovelace (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Well-supported at 4.0 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Lightly raced and open to improvement after a fair 5th last time. Trainer is capable and the market respect is significant in a weak field.

shortlist.name: Next Of Kin (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear favourite at 1.5 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with consistent recent form, placing in three of last four starts. Trained by the top-class de Kock yard and partnered by a reliable jockey. The odds reflect strong market confidence and the form is solid for this grade.

shortlist.name: Black Platina (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Second favourite at 2.12 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent performer with multiple placings this season. While not winning, has been running respectably in similar company and is the main market rival to the favourite. Connections are capable and the horse is reliable at this level.

shortlist.name: Takeyourbestshot (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Third choice at 2.8 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: String of runner-up finishes signals a horse in form and knocking on the door for a win. Consistency is a positive, though may lack the finishing kick of the top two. Still, the form is strong enough to merit shortlist inclusion.

shortlist.name: Record High (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear market leader at 1.84 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Strong market support and recent win two starts ago indicate peak form. Trainer and jockey both have solid reputations locally. Despite a modest last run, overall profile and odds suggest this is the horse to beat.

shortlist.name: The Gliding Fish (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Second favorite at 2.22 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win three starts back and consistent efforts in the frame. Connections are respected and the odds reflect strong market confidence. No major negatives in recent form.

shortlist.name: King's Island (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Joint second favorite at 2.22 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Has won this season and remains competitive in similar company. Consistent enough to warrant shortlist inclusion given market respect and proven ability at this level.

shortlist.name: El Rey Viene (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Well-supported at 2.56 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent with multiple placings and a win in last six starts. Connections are reliable and the horse is holding form well. Odds indicate genuine market respect.

shortlist.name: Queen Amina (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Clear favourite at 1.24 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win in last eight starts. Connections are reliable and odds indicate strong market confidence. No signs of decline in form, making her the standout.

shortlist.name: Star Of The Future (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Solid contender at 4.0 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and consistent placings suggest improving form. Trainer is respected locally and odds offer reasonable value for a horse with upward trajectory.

shortlist.name: King Bavarian (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Competitive at 4.5 on exchange.
shortlist.rationale: Recent win and multiple placings in last eight runs. Trainer has a good record at this venue. Form is reliable and odds are fair for a horse with proven ability.

shortlist.name: Super Fast (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 3.0; solid value among market leaders.
shortlist.rationale: Consistently placed in recent starts (five consecutive 2nds), indicating reliability and strong current form. Connections are respected and the horse is holding form well, suggesting a win is imminent if maintaining this level.

shortlist.name: Kanaal Skater (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 4.0; competitive price for a last-time winner.
shortlist.rationale: Progressive profile with a recent win and improving form figures. Top jockey booking and a trainer known for placing horses well at this level. Should be competitive if repeating latest effort.

shortlist.name: Magic Surprise (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 1.51; prominent in the market, coming off a win.
shortlist.rationale: Recent winner with steadily improving form. The latest victory suggests the horse is peaking at the right time, and the market support is notable. Connections are capable and the form is trending upward.

shortlist.name: Princess Hannah (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 1.24, clear market leader among non-odds-on runners
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple wins this season, including a string of 1s and a solid 4th last time. Proven ability to win in this grade, and connections are in good order. Odds reflect strong market support without being prohibitively short.

shortlist.name: Mojo Man (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 3, solid second-favorite
shortlist.rationale: Has been running consistently well, placing in last two starts and showing ability to compete at this level. Trained by a top yard and gets a strong jockey booking. Represents value as a likely improver with reliable recent form.

shortlist.name: Rainbow Reward (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 3.25, competitive in the market
shortlist.rationale: Ultra-consistent profile with three consecutive placings, indicating readiness to win. Has been knocking on the door and is well placed in this field. Market respect and solid connections add to appeal.

shortlist.name: Catavar (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 1.54, clear market leader among non-odds-on runners
shortlist.rationale: Consistent recent form with multiple placings and a win two starts back. Connections are reliable and the horse is holding form well, suggesting fitness and readiness. Odds indicate strong market support without being prohibitively short, offering some value for a likely winner.

shortlist.name: Yannakis (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 3, second choice in the market
shortlist.rationale: Recent win last time out signals improvement and readiness. Form shows progression and ability to win at this level. Market support is solid, and connections are capable. Should be competitive if repeating latest effort.

shortlist.name: Lou Lou The Legend (Saf)
shortlist.odds_note: Exchange 4.5, respected in the market
shortlist.rationale: Won two starts ago and has a generally consistent profile. Trainer and jockey are experienced, and the horse has shown ability to compete at this level. Odds reflect realistic winning chance without being overbet.
